projects.name: Facial Emotion Recognition System
projects.description: This system utilizes a Convolutional Neural Network (CNN) architecture for recognizing facial emotions employing layers like Conv2D, Batch Normalization, MaxPooling2D, Dropout, and Dense layers. Dropout layers are used to prevent overfitting, strategically placed before Dense layers. The final layers include Dense with ReLU activation and a SoftMax output for facial emotion classification. Ensures proper model loading, input validation, and displays the generated blog in the app interface.

projects.name: Driver Drowsiness Detection
projects.description: System designed to automatically detect if a driver is active while driving or getting drowsy. Involves the use of computer vision techniques, machine learning models, and image processing algorithms like using TensorFlow, Open CV.

experiences.description: As a social manager at ESSDSONs I developed skills in customer interaction, social media management, CRM, community engagement, marketing strategies, analytics, problem-solving, collaboration and adaptability. We were able to achieve more than 40,000 subscribers to our channel with millions of views in total.
